name: Section
description: `Form.Section` lets you compose blocks of fields and values to be reused in different contexts.

props.name: path
props.doc: A path to the section (JSON Pointer). When defined, fields inside the section will get this path as a prefix of their own path.

props.name: overwriteProps
props.doc: Overwrite field props for the section.

props.name: translation
props.doc: Provide a translation for the section (e.g. `{'nb-NO': { MySection: { MyField: { label: 'Custom' }}}}`).

props.name: required
props.doc: Makes all fields inside it required.

props.name: validateInitially
props.doc: If set to `true`, the whole section will be validated initially. All fields will then automatically get `validateInitially` and show their error messages. Can be useful in combination with `containerMode="auto"`.

props.name: defaultData
props.doc: Provide default data to the section fields and values, in case the data context (Form.Handler) is not available.

props.name: data
props.doc: Provide data to the section fields and values, in case the data context (Form.Handler) is not available.

props.name: containerMode
props.doc: Defines the container mode. Can be `view`, `edit` or `auto`. When set to `auto`, the mode will initially be "edit" if fields contain errors. Defaults to `auto`.

props.name: children
props.doc: All the fields and values inside the section.

events.name: onChange
events.doc: Will be called when a value of a field was changed by the user, with the data set (including the changed value) as argument.
